monitoring_events.title: Heritage Foundation launches Project 2025 initiative
monitoring_events.summary: Heritage Foundation launched $22 million "2025 Presidential Transition Project" published April 2023, bringing together 140+ former Trump staffers and 100+ conservative organizations. Created 920-page "Mandate for Leadership" blueprint, LinkedIn-style personnel database, Presidential Administration Academy training, and 180-day action playbook. Authors include Trump officials Russ Vought (OMB), Chris Miller (Defense), and Stephen Miller.

monitoring_events.notes: Most comprehensive conservative governing blueprint in modern history. Despite Trump distancing himself during campaign, after winning 2024 election he nominated several Project 2025 architects to positions. Four days into second term, Time found nearly two-thirds of Trump's executive actions "mirror or partially mirror" Project 2025 proposals. CNN found 36 of 53 first-week orders matched Heritage Foundation's brief.

monitoring_events.title: Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) created; Elon Musk and Vivek Ramaswamy tapped to lead
monitoring_events.summary: Trump signed an executive order on January 20, 2025, creating the Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) by renaming the U.S. Digital Service to "U.S. DOGE Service" for 18 months. Elon Musk leads the temporary organization set to expire July 4, 2026, with a mandate to upgrade federal IT systems to "private-sector standards" and cut $500 billion in annual federal costs. Vivek Ramaswamy departed the same day to run for Ohio governor. The order formalized what was announced in November 2024, placing DOGE within the Executive Office of the President despite earlier claims it would operate "outside of Government."

monitoring_events.title: National emergency declared at U.S. southern border
monitoring_events.summary: Trump declared national emergency at southern border citing "invasion" by cartels, criminal gangs, and "unvetted military-age males." Deployed 1,500 active-duty troops (1,000 Army, 500 Marines) with helicopters and intelligence analysts. Ordered Pentagon to develop 10-day plan to "seal off" border with Mexico including more troops, drones, barriers. Designated cartels as foreign terrorist organizations including Tren de Aragua and MS-13. Signed order authorizing direct military operations against cartels on foreign soil potentially inside Mexico. Ended "catch and release," reinstated "Remain in Mexico" policy.
